features: Perforated Amara palm, durable and easy to care for
Adjustable cuff with hook and loop fastener ensures a custom fit
Soft microfiber thumb to wipe sweat
Combination of Power Mesh and spandex provides great stretchability and ventilation
Patented Ergo Air® X-Vent palm evacuates moisture and ventilates to keep hands cool
Puller at wrist to help slip gloves on
